dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Alliance Publication The Current Landscape and opportunities for advancement in low resource settings The objective of this report is twofold 1 to describe the current state of mhealth intervention design implementation and evaluation that can be leveraged to improve maternal and newborn health globally and 2 to identify ways to strategically advance mhealth in maternal and newborn care as well as strategies for scaling up interventions December 2012
Leveraging Mobile Technologies to Promote Maternal and Newborn Health
